qas.question: UNFPA has  been accused of supporting what type of abortion?
UNFPA has been accused of supporting programs that coerce what?
What groups have made these accusations against UNFPA?
Controversy regarding these accusations has caused conflict with how many presidential administrations?
Who was UNFPA accurately accused by?

plausible_answers.text: Ronald Reagan, George H. W. Bush and George W. Bush

qas.question: Which administrations funded UNFPA the most?

plausible_answers.text: providing support for government programs which have promoted forced-abortions and coercive sterilizations
